verses.roman:
sei saba līlā kahi saṅkṣepa kariyā
caitanya-kṛpāte likhi kṣudra-jīva hañā

synonyms: sei saba—all those; līlā—pastimes; kahi—I say; saṅkṣepa kariyā—in brief; caitanya-kṛpāte—by the mercy of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; likhi—I write; kṣudra-jīva hañā—being a very insignificant living entity.
translation: I have briefly described those pastimes. Whatever I have written is by the mercy of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, since I am an insignificant living being.
